charms.name: Carved Wooden Bird
charms.description: A small, crudely carved bird that feels surprisingly light in your hand. A simple good luck charm.

charms.name: Scrying Stone Fragment
charms.description: A shard of a larger crystal, it seems to drink in ambient light and hums with a faint energy.

charms.name: Bound Earth Totem
charms.description: A small bundle of sticks and stones tied with enchanted sinew. It feels solid and reassuring.

charms.name: Idol of the Predator
charms.description: A small stone idol of a jungle cat, poised to strike. It encourages you to find your enemy's weaknesses.

charms.name: Sunstone Locket
charms.description: This locket contains a small, polished sunstone that glows with inner warmth, making you more receptive to healing energies.

charms.name: Flask of Volatile Ichor
charms.description: A sealed flask containing a swirling, caustic liquid. Sometimes, a drop splashes onto your weapon.

charms.name: Bloodstone Fetish
charms.description: This dark, pulsating stone seems to feed on the life force of fallen foes, transferring some of their energy to you.

charms.name: Tome of Tenacity
charms.description: A miniature, iron-bound book whose passages speak of endurance and willpower, steeling your resolve against effects that would hinder you.

charms.name: Shard of Unstable Power
charms.description: This crystalline shard vibrates erratically, occasionally surging with immense power when you engage in combat.

charms.name: Heart of the Aspects
charms.description: A legendary artifact that channels raw elemental and arcane power, sometimes aligning perfectly with your own spells.
